description: iP2PGlobal Cryptocurrency Financing Platform aims to re-shape personal financing by introducing Sharia compliant financing products to individuals worldwide. Offering the first unsecured crypto loan, it will also feature a single global benchmark rates for fair loan pricing, compensation fund to cover default risks, full KYC & AML compliance and proper e-lending documentation in order to enforce debt collectibility, furthermore financing will be in US$ pegged stablecoins to encourage real world usage. Borrowers will have to stake TWQ Tokens when applying for personal financing on the platform. The TWQ token is reusable and will be returned on successful loan repayment.
name: TWQ Token
